content: after the release of my first pair of christmas socks in 2024 i was already thinking about the next christmas design what about socks with mistletoes on it i started designing again with pencils and paper but it wasn t as easy as i thought mistletoe leaves are not as distinguish as holly leaves and a sock is certainly not big enough for a whole mistletoe sometime in summer during a run i saw little children in the park with daisy chains on their heads and i got inspired with the final design you can find charts for charts for 60 64 68 and 72 stitches as well as ladderback charts **material** you will need * 4-ply fingering sock yarn in your choice of colors i ve used grey as main color green for the mistletoe leaves white for the bobbles approximately 8 meters and the tiniest bit of red for the bow * your preferred sock nneedles in 2 25 mm and 2 5 mm sizes or the sizes you usually use forncolorwork socks * tapestry needle * 2 stitch markers * optional a smallncrochet hook such as 1 5 mm which can be helpful for working the bobbles
